participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and focused, yet enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and practical, but has a fear of the unexpected.
participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
